name: Green (itch) (OnionCorp)
description:
Help Stevie reach his flags and prove the world wrong- He's not just a shy dude, he's a big strong Dinosaur! 

In Singleplayer mode, you can speedrun the game- or just play it normally. All speedrun records will be on our YouTubeChannel; https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCJ7gAwFxQGyZtbxvGxQHB7A/

In Multiplayer mode, play with a friend or a family member (annoying younger siblings NOT recommended) to try and reach the end without dying, or with dying, trust me, either way is super fun. But try not to die, or Simon will win the betting pool of cheerios, and no one wants to be beat by an older sibling. 

Reading the tutorial is recommended before playing, as is pressing enter on the Title screen.

We do not own any of the music played in Green, we got it here: https://freemusicarchive.org/music/Good_Old_Neon/This_Is_the_News/10-VideoGameSo...
